title: The Celebrations Continue in LA
description:
On this edition of NFL Live the crew discusses what's next for the Rams, can they repeat? And the latest on Joe Burrow's knee injury. The crew also dives into Todd McShays Mock Draft 2.0, which teams will be getting much needed upgrades.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Rams continue celebrating their SB LVI win with a parade through LA
